prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a muscular boulder with arms and a determined expression.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of strength and resilience, with a rocky exterior.
Generate an image of a small, yet powerful creature made entirely of stone with a fierce look.
Make a Pokemon that has a tough exterior, showcasing its rocky features and powerful fists.
Imagine a Pokemon that appears to be a living rock formation with a friendly yet strong demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a rugged rock, but has arms and a cheerful personality.
Show me a rugged, rocky Pokemon that stands strong in the face of challenges, with a vibrant personality.
